props.module.author: Wim Taymans <wim.taymans@gmail.com>
props.module.description: Use realtime thread scheduling, falling back to RTKit
props.module.name: libpipewire-module-rt
props.module.usage: ( nice.level=<priority: default 20(don't change)> ) ( rt.prio=<priority: default 88> ) ( rt.time.soft=<in usec: default -1> ) ( rt.time.hard=<in usec: default -1> ) ( rlimits.enabled=<default true> ) ( rtportal.enabled=<default true> ) ( rtkit.enabled=<default true> ) ( uclamp.min=<default 0> ) ( uclamp.max=<default 1024> )
